attributes.action: change the law on non-residents opening bank accounts in UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently, as a British citizen living in the Czech Republic, I am unable to open a British bank account as I do not have a UK address - apparently this is the law.  This needs to change. As a British citizen, I should have the right to a British bank account.

All banks have told me I need 2 items of proof of UK address. My mother, for example, cannot get a UK bank account because everything is on my father's name.
